questions.question: Which word shows what the butterfly does?
questions.explanation: "Fly" is the action verb. It shows how the butterfly moves its wings.

questions.question: The chef _____ the vegetables for the soup.
questions.explanation: "Chops" is correct because it matches with "The chef" and shows what the chef does to the vegetables.

questions.question: Which is the action word in "The lion roars loudly"?
questions.explanation: "Roars" is the action verb because it tells us what the lion is doing.

questions.question: The students _____ their hands before answering.
questions.explanation: "Raise" is correct for students. It shows what the students do with their hands.

questions.question: Which word shows an action?
questions.explanation: "Smile" is an action verb because it's something you can do with your face movement. "Happy" and "friendly" describe feelings.

questions.question: I _____ my favourite song every morning.
questions.explanation: "Sing" is the right action verb to use with "I". It shows what you do with your favourite song.

questions.question: What is the action in "The frog leaps into the pond"?
questions.explanation: "Leaps" is the action verb because it shows what the frog does to get into the pond.

questions.question: Which word shows what a bird does?
questions.explanation: "Chirp" is the action verb. It shows the sound a bird makes from its mouth.

questions.question: Which is the action word in "The boy throws the ball"?
questions.explanation: "Throws" is the action verb because it shows what the boy does with the ball.

questions.question: We _____ our room every weekend.
questions.explanation: "Clean" is the right action verb to use with "We". It shows what we do to our room.

questions.question: Which word shows an action?
questions.explanation: "Shout" is an action verb because it's something you can do. "Loud" and "noisy" describe sounds.

questions.question: The baby _____ when it's hungry.
questions.explanation: "Cries" is correct for "The baby". It tells us what the baby does when hungry. They cry when they feel hungry.

questions.question: They _____ to school by bus every day.
questions.explanation: "Go" is the right action verb to use with "They". It shows how they travel to school.

questions.question: Which is the action in "The fish swims in the aquarium"?
questions.explanation: "Swims" is the action verb because it shows what the fish does in the aquarium.

questions.question: I _____ my hands after playing outside.
questions.explanation: "Wash" is the right action verb to use with "I". It shows what you do with your hands after playing.

questions.question: Which word shows what a dog might do?
questions.explanation: "Bark" is the action verb. It shows what a dog does with its mouth. Dogs bark.

questions.question: Which is the action word in "The girl skips rope"?
questions.explanation: "Skips" is the action verb because it shows what the girl does with the rope.

questions.question: Which word shows an action?
questions.explanation: "Run" is an action verb because it's something you can do. "Quick" and "fast" describe how something happens.

questions.question: What is the action in "The rabbit hops in the garden"?
questions.explanation: "Hops" is the action verb because it shows how the rabbit moves in the garden.

questions.question: Choose the correct spelling:
questions.explanation: The correct spelling is “G-A-R-D-E-N.” It is a piece of land next to a house where flowers and vegetables can be grown.
